sqlMap.select: select id,name,unit_id unitId,phone,phone_two phoneTwo ,phone_thr phoneThr,status from mj_house_unit where id = #id#

select count(1) from mj_house_unit where delFlag =0
name like '%$name$%'

select id,name,unit_id unitId,phone,phone_two phoneTwo,phone_thr phoneThr,status,(select count(1) from r_house_person where r_house_person.house_id = mj_house_unit.id) level from mj_house_unit where unit_id = #unitId#
name like '%$name$%'
ORDER BY id
sqlMap.update: update mj_house_unit set delFlag=1 where id=#id#
update mj_house_unit set name=#name# ,phone=#phone# ,phone_two = #phoneTwo#,phone_thr = #phoneThr#,status = #status# where id=#id#
